news.title: Trump halts wind projects, including Coastal Virginia Offshore Wind, Dominion stock drops 5%
news.description: Interior Secretary Doug Burgum said the administration paused the projects due to national security concerns identified by the Pentagon.

news.title: Why Warner Bros. Discovery shareholders might opt for Paramount's offer — and why they might not
news.description: WBD shareholders must weigh pros and cons of tendering their shares to Paramount for $30 per share. CNBC lays out the arguments on both sides.

news.title: Alphabet to acquire data center and energy infrastructure company Intersect
news.description: Alphabet said the acquisition will help bring more data center and generation capacity online faster.

news.title: Epstein Files: Schumer to force Senate vote on suing DOJ over partial release
news.description: President Donald Trump signed a law compelling the full release of the Jeffrey Epstein files. But the DOJ has released just a fraction.

news.title: S&P 500 rises to start a holiday-shortened week, led by tech: Live updates
news.description: Wall Street is coming off a mixed week for the major averages.

news.title: The charts show a possible breakout in this insurance stock, says Katie Stockton
news.description: Katie Stockton breaks down the charts on this insurer heading into 2026.

news.title: Denmark to summon U.S. ambassador as Trump's Greenland special envoy appointment stirs tensions
news.description: Denmark pushes back against Trump's appointment of Jeff Landry as U.S. Special Envoy to Greenland.

news.title: Orsted shares plummet 13% as U.S. pauses 5 offshore wind projects; European markets closed lower
news.description: It follows a record-breaking previous session which saw the Stoxx 600 index hit 588.07 points.

news.title: Asia’s worst-performing currency is set for a rocky start to 2026
news.description: Rupee emerges as Asia's worst performing currency in 2025 amid trade policy uncertainty and capital outflows.

news.title: NYSE insider Jay Woods on the 'Magnificent Seven' stock that's breaking out into year-end
news.description: Jay Woods, chief market strategist at Freedom Capital Markets, will continue to keep an eye on Tesla.

news.title: UK stocks outperformed Wall Street this year — and investors see more upside ahead in 2026
news.description: London’s FTSE 100 returned more than all three major Wall Street averages this year.

news.title: Crypto laments loss of key ally on Capitol Hill after Lummis announces retirement
news.description: Sen. Cynthia Lummis’ retirement tees up a Republican primary in Wyoming, where the victor will be heavily favored in November.

news.title: Instacart ends AI-driven pricing tests that pushed up costs for some shoppers
news.description: A study earlier this month showed that Instacart's algorithmic pricing tools caused shoppers to pay different prices for identical items from the same store.

news.title: Asset manager Janus Henderson gets bought by Trian, General Catalyst for $7.4 billion
news.description: Asset manager Janus Henderson agreed to be acquired by investors Trian Fund Management and General Catalyst, the companies announced Monday.

news.title: Trust these numbers? Economists see a lot of flaws in delayed CPI report showing downward inflation
news.description: Thursday saw the release of a much lighter-than-expected inflation report for November, and economists are already questioning its significance.

news.title: November consumer prices rose at a 2.7% annual rate, lower than expected, delayed data shows
news.description: Economists polled by Dow Jones expected CPI to have risen 3.1% on an annualized basis.

news.title: Bank of England cuts interest rates, in welcome Christmas boost for consumers
news.description: The Bank of England voted to cut interest rates from 4% to 3.75% in its last monetary policy move of 2025.

news.title: November's inflation report is the first to be released after the shutdown. Here's what to expect
news.description: November's CPI report is expected to show the annual inflation rate at 3.1%, according to economists polled by Dow Jones.

news.title: Watch Fed Governor Christopher Waller speak on interest rates and the race to succeed Powell
news.description: Waller is one of the five finalists considered for to replace Fed Chairman Jerome Powell when his term expires in May.

news.title: Hassett says Fed independence is ‘really important’ and chair candidates shouldn’t be disqualified for being Trump’s friend
news.description: Hassett declined in a CNBC interview to directly address his own candidacy but said forging consensus is an important part of the job.

news.title: We're putting an AI giant in the Bullpen — not letting a mistake cloud our judgment
news.description: Alphabet can no longer be ignored.

news.title: Space stocks rocket higher as sector optimism gains steam into 2026
news.description: Space stocks have rallied in recent weeks following news that Musk's SpaceX is planning to go public next year and widespread government interest.

news.title: Tech stocks rebound, Google's boomerang strategy, Xbox's slump and more in Morning Squawk
news.description: Here are five key things investors need to know to start the trading day.

news.title: Uber, Lyft set to trial robotaxis in the UK in partnership with China's Baidu
news.description: Chinese tech giant Baidu has announced plans to bring autonomous vehicles to London through its partnerships with Lyft and Uber, with testing to begin next year.

news.title: Epstein files: DOJ restores image showing Trump after backlash
news.description: The Department of Justice faces criticism for not releasing all of the Epstein files on Friday, despite a law signed by President Donald Trump requiring it.

news.title: Kremlin says peace prospects not improved by Europe, Ukraine changes to U.S. proposals
news.description: European and Ukrainian negotiators have been discussing changes to a U.S. set of proposals for an agreement to end the nearly four-year-old war.

news.title: Epstein files: A number of documents, including Trump photo, reportedly removed from DOJ release site
news.description: A missing photo shows a desk displaying a large assortment of framed pictures and other items. Among them is a picture showing President Donald Trump's face.

news.title: U.S. in 'active pursuit' of another oil tanker near Venezuela, the third in less than a week
news.description: The U.S. Coast Guard is pursuing an oil tanker near Venezuela, in what would be the second such operation this weekend and the third in less than a week.
